org.wildfly.swarm.config.elytron

Class SyslogAuditLog<T extends SyslogAuditLog<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wildfly.swarm.config.elytron.SyslogAuditLog<T>

  • public class SyslogAuditLog<T extends SyslogAuditLog<T>>
extends Object
    An audit logger that sends audit events to a remote syslog server.
